about.heading: About
about.text:
I'm Jochem — a developer building digital tools, creative experiments, and everything in between. This showcase collects all my active projects in one place.

Every project starts as a curiosity. Some grow into full products, others stay experiments. All of them teach me something new.

contact.heading: Contact
contact.text: Please contgact me for further information at devdiele@gmail.com
